data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.

data.name: data
data.description:
Data: RowData[]

    RowData: Record & {
      _selected?: boolean
    }

    `_selected`  Denotes row selection

onSelect.name: onSelect
onSelect.description: Callback to be called when a row is selected

type.name: function
type.value: ((rowIndexes: number[], selected: boolean, allSelected: RowData[], selectAll?: boolean | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((rowIndexes: number[], selected: boolean, allSelected: RowData[], selectAll?: boolean | undefined) => void) | undefined

loading.name: loading
loading.description: Set for loading state of Table(in case of sync)

separator.name: separator
separator.description:
Shows left separator to all columns

**Can be override by Column Schema**

error.name: error
error.description: Set for error state of Table(in case of sync)

searchDebounceDuration.name: searchDebounceDuration
searchDebounceDuration.description: Debounce duration to call updateData in case of search term update

headerOptions.name: headerOptions

onRowClick.name: onRowClick
onRowClick.description:
Callback to be called when a row is clicked in case of Table type: "resource"

`onRowClickFunction: (data: RowData, rowIndexes?: number) => void`

loaderSchema.name: loaderSchema
loaderSchema.description: Schema to be used for loading state **only when `schema: undefined`**

schema.name: schema
schema.description:
Schema: ColumnSchema[]

    ColumnSchema: {
        name: string;
        displayName: string;
        width?: React.ReactText;
        minWidth?: React.ReactText;
        maxWidth?: React.ReactText;
        resizable?: boolean;
        sorting?: boolean;
        comparator?: (a: RowData, b: RowData) => -1 | 0 | 1;
        separator?: boolean;
        pinned?: 'left' | 'right';
        hidden?: boolean;
        filters?: DropdownProps['options'];
        onFilterChange?: (data: RowData, filters: Filter) => boolean;
        translate?: (data: RowData) => RowData,
        cellType?: CellType;
        cellRenderer?: React.FunctionComponent\;
        align?: Alignment;
    }

    GridCellProps: {
        size: GridSize;
        rowIndex: number;
        colIndex: number;
        data: RowData;
        schema: ColumnSchema;
        loading: boolean;
        expanded: boolean;
    }

| CellType | CellData | Default Width |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DEFAULT | string \| { title: string } | { width: 200 } |
| WITH\_META\_LIST | { title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 200 } |
| AVATAR | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title?: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_TEXT | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string } | { width: 250 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_META\_LIST | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 250 } |
| ICON | { icon: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| STATUS_HINT | { title: string, statusAppearance: string } | { width: 100 } |
| Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | name | key of the value in `RowData` | | | displayName | Column Head Label | | | width | width of the column(px or %) | | | minWidth | min-width of the column(px or %) | 100 | | maxWidth | max-width of the column(px or %) | 800 | | resizable | Denotes if column is resizable | | | sorting | Enables sorting in column | true | | comparator | Sorting Function to be passed(in case of sync) | Default string comparator(localeCompare) | | separator | Shows Left separator | | | tooltip | Shows tooltip on hover | | | pinned | Pin column | | | hidden | Denotes if column is hidden | | | filters | Filter options for the column | | | onFilterChange | Callback to be called on Filter Change | | | translate | Translate Cell Data | | | cellType | Cell Type | 'DEFAULT' | | cellRenderer | Custom Cell Renderer | | | align | Align cell content
**Align applicable only for following cellTypes:
DEFAULT, AVATAR, ICON, STATUS_HINT** | "left" |

nestedRowRenderer.name: nestedRowRenderer

withPagination.name: withPagination
withPagination.description: Set for `Pagination` component in `Table`(**Not applied if pageSize >= totalRecords**)

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description:
Number of rows to be rendered on a page

**Also used to control number of rows to be rendered while loading: true**

errorTemplate.name: errorTemplate

sortingList.name: sortingList
sortingList.description:
Initial sortingList passed to `Table` 
SortType: 'asc' | 'desc'

filterList.name: filterList
filterList.description:
Initial filterList passed to `Table` 
Filter: Array of selected values passed in dropdown
`any[]`

multipleSorting.name: multipleSorting
multipleSorting.description: Set to allow multiple column sorting

onPageChange.name: onPageChange
onPageChange.description: Callback to be called on page change in case of withPagination: true

fetchData.name: fetchData

errorType.name: errorType
errorType.description: Error type to be passed to errorTemplate props

onSearch.name: onSearch
onSearch.description: Callback to be called on searchTerm change(in case of sync)

data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
